STM: Feeling overwhelmed by college coursework, particularly in Computer Science and Calculus
Questioning life choices and future plans due to academic pressure

MTM.Summary: Navigating the academic rigor of college, particularly in STEM fields.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling overwhelmed, questioning future plans, academic pressure
MTM.Goals: Adapt to college demands, find career direction
MTM.Transition: Moving from high school to college environment.

LTM.Milestone: Began college, facing challenges in STEM courses.

short_term: Secure an internship in a STEM-related field
long_term: Graduate with a degree in a STEM discipline
Start a career in tech or research

STM: Struggling with social interactions and making new friends in college
Experiencing feelings of loneliness and missing high school friends

MTM.Summary: Struggling to adapt socially in college.
MTM.Patterns: Loneliness, difficulty making friends, missing high school
MTM.Goals: Build new connections, maintain old friendships
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from a known social environment to a new one.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of social support, personal growth

short_term: Join at least two clubs or social groups at college
Set up regular catch-ups with high school friends
long_term: Establish a strong network of friends and mentors
Develop long-lasting relationships both personal and professional

STM: Dealing with the stress of college life, including sleep deprivation
Concerns about personal hygiene and living conditions in the dorms

MTM.Summary: Dealing with the stress of college life.
MTM.Goals: Improve sleep, manage stress, maintain hygiene
MTM.Transition: Adapting to independent living in college.

short_term: Incorporate regular exercise into weekly routine
long_term: Maintain physical and mental health through balanced lifestyle
Develop stress management techniques for long-term resilience

STM: Surprised by the high cost of living in NYC, like expensive coffee
Feeling financially strained, particularly with the cost of education and living expenses

MTM.Summary: Facing the high cost of living in NYC.
MTM.Goals: Budget effectively, find ways to reduce costs
MTM.Transition: From parental financial support to self-management.

LTM.Milestone: Realized the cost of living in NYC.

short_term: Create and stick to a monthly budget
Explore part-time job or scholarship opportunities
long_term: Save enough for graduate studies or a down payment on a home

STM: Pondering the authenticity of happiness and social interactions in college
Questioning the relevance of some classes to real life

MTM.Summary: Questioning the purpose and authenticity of college life.
MTM.Goals: Find personal meaning in education, reflect on life choices
MTM.Transition: From structured high school to open-ended college life.

LTM.Milestone: Began questioning the purpose of education.

short_term: Attend a seminar or lecture on philosophy or life purpose
Start a journal to reflect on personal growth
long_term: Develop a personal philosophy or life mission
Engage in continuous learning and self-improvement

STM: Struggling with coding assignments, particularly Java
Frustration with technology and its demands in coursework

MTM.Summary: Struggling with technology demands in coursework.
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, adapt to technology
MTM.Transition: From basic tech use to advanced applications in education.

LTM.Implications: Need for tech proficiency in academic success.

short_term: Seek help from campus tech support or coding clubs
long_term: Become proficient in multiple programming languages
Contribute to or lead tech projects or startups
